data.title: Cheap Flights & All Inclusive Vacations from Vancouver
data.meta_description: Vancouver's travel deal community.  Find cheap flights, holiday packages, and all inclusive vacations from YVR.  Featuring articles, guides, alerts, forums, discount promo codes, sales and more.
data.text:
2024

15

August

Vancouver to Rio de Janeiro, Brazil - $754 CAD roundtrip including taxes

American Airlines has dropped the price of their flights from Vancouver to Rio de Janeiro, Brazil down to $754 CAD roundtrip including taxes.

The flights have 1 stop in Dallas each way.

At one point, Brazil was going to bring back their visa requirement for Canadians. But that has been delayed until at least April 2025.

Availability for travel

September, October, November 2024

How to find and book this deal

1. Start with the following Google Flights search:

Google Flights: Vancouver to Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

- Click on the departure date box to open up the calendar view and browse for cheap date combinations.

- Adjust the trip length at the bottom.

- Look for the dates that are $754 roundtrip

2. Go to Skyscanner

3. Search for a flight from Vancouver (YVR) to Rio de Janeiro, Brazil (GIG)

- Try the same dates you found on Google Flights.

screenshot from Skyscanner

Sign up for YVR Deals Alerts from Vancouver

Go to the Alerts Page to sign up for flight deal alerts by e-mail, Facebook, or Twitter.

Travellers from Vancouver also often sign up for alerts from Calgary and Toronto.

Join us in the YVR Deals Facebook Group

For live discussion of this deal, or to get some amazing travel advice (about anywhere) from your 107,000 fellow passengers in Vancouver, join us in the

YVR Deals Facebook Group.

^^^ click the 'Join Group' button when you arrive.

Hit Like if you like this deal! Click Share to show your friends on Facebook.
